chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: ModuleSpace R_Ring
f: R -> V
ptd: SF_seq
l0: (R * R)%type

Goal:
Riemann_sum f (SF_rcons ptd l0) = plus (Riemann_sum f ptd) (scal (fst l0 - last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd)) (f (snd l0)))

Premises:
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
Notation ModuleSpace := ModuleSpace.type
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
plus = fun G : AbelianGroup => AbelianGroup.plus G (AbelianGroup.class G) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G -> G -> G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
scal = fun (K : Ring) (V : ModuleSpace K) => ModuleSpace.scal K (AbelianGroup.Pack V (ModuleSpace.class K V) V) (ModuleSpace.class K V) : forall (K : Ring) (V : ModuleSpace K), K -> V -> V Arguments K, V are implicit and maximally inserted
SF_rcons = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) (t : R * T) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := rcons (SF_t s) t |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R * T -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Riemann_sum = fun (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) => foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (f (snd y))) (SF_h ptd, zero) (SF_t ptd)) : (R -> V) -> SF_seq -> V Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f : R -> V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f (SF_cons h0 ptd) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd - fst h0) (f (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f ptd)
SF_last_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type]
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
SF_lx_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (h : R * ?T), SF_lx (SF_rcons s h) = rcons (SF_lx s) (fst h) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
SF_map_rcons : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq) (h : R * ?T), SF_map f0 (SF_rcons s h) = SF_rcons (SF_map f0 s) (fst h, f0 (snd h)) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type] ?T0 : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type]
SF_cut_down_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (fst h, Rmin (snd h) x) (SF_nil x)
scal_distr_l : forall (x : ?K) (u v : ?V), scal x (plus u v) = plus (scal x u) (scal x v) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_distr_r : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (plus x y) u = plus (scal x u) (scal y u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
Riemann_fine_unif_part : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) -> a <= b -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) /\ pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) /\ SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) = a /\ last (SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) = b
SF_ly_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (h : R * ?T), SF_ly (SF_rcons s h) = rcons (SF_ly s) (snd h) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type]
SF_cut_up_l : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> last (SF_h (SF_cut_up s x)) (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) = last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s)
SF_cut_up_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (x, Rmax (snd h) x) ptd
SF_map_cons : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_map f0 (SF_cons h s) = SF_cons (fst h, f0 (snd h)) (SF_map f0 s) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type] ?T0 : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type]
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s) = last 0 (SF_lx s) where ?T : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Type]
scal_minus_distr_r : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (minus x y) u = minus (scal x u) (scal y u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_minus_distr_l : forall (x : ?K) (u v : ?V), scal x (minus u v) = minus (scal x u) (scal x v) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
plus_reg_r : forall r x y : ?G, plus x r = plus y r -> x = y where ?G : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- AbelianGroup]
scal_opp_l : forall (x : ?K) (u : ?V), scal (opp x) u = opp (scal x u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
scal_opp_r : forall (x : ?K) (u : ?V), scal x (opp u) = opp (scal x u) where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
seq_cut_up = fix seq_cut_up (s : seq (R * R)) (x : R) {struct s} : seq (R * R) := match s with | [::] => [:: (x, x)] | h :: t => if Rle_dec (fst h) x then seq_cut_up t x else [:: (x, x), (fst h, Rmax (snd h) x) & t] end : seq (R * R) -> R -> seq (R * R) Argument scopes are [seq_scope R_scope]
scal_assoc : forall (x y : ?K) (u : ?V), scal x (scal y u) = scal (mult x y) u where ?K : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- Ring] ?V : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- ModuleSpace ?K]
prod_plus = fun (U V : AbelianGroup) (x y : U * V) => (plus (fst x) (fst y), plus (snd x) (snd y)) : forall U V : AbelianGroup, U * V -> U * V -> U * V Arguments U, V are implicit and maximally inserted
plus_zero_r : forall x : ?G, plus x zero = x where ?G : [V : ModuleSpace R_Ring f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq l0 : R * R |- AbelianGroup]

```coq
unfold Riemann_sum.
rewrite SF_rcons_eq.
rewrite pairmap_rcons.
simpl.
rewrite scal_distr_l.
rewrite scal_assoc.
rewrite scal_minus_distr_l.
rewrite plus_reg_r.
rewrite Riemann_sum_cons.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```
